name: PHAM News
description:
Plumbing, Heating & Air Movement News (PHAM News) is an invaluable source of information for installers, specifiers and merchants operating in the domestic and light commercial sectors of the market. 

Its unique newspaper tabloid format enables editorial to be presented in depth, with each monthly issue packed full of news, product information, training advice, installer tips competitions and much, much more. 

Visit PHAM News on Stand No. N2705 to register for your FREE monthly copy and to meet the team.
address:
16 - 18 Hawkes Yard Hall
Armitage Park
Nr Rugeley
Staffordshire
